title: How to Have Fun With an American Girl Doll

methods.name: Making a Home for your Doll

steps.headline: Make a bedroom or sleeping space for your doll.
steps.description: Make a bed by putting 2 towels (bottom), a regular blanket (top), and two mini pillows (from Barbie's or from a mini blanket) in a suitably sized box. Provide a comfortable area for your doll to sleep or lounge. Provide her with a blanket and duvet.

steps.headline: Make other rooms for your doll.
steps.description: Use a small box and design a whole room for her. It could be a playroom, a kitchen or a living room. Make fun accessories to go in the room. Then play with her in her new room.

steps.headline: Buy or make mini items or use mini household items to make her room to look like her own room.
Style your doll's hair.
steps.description: Set up a mini salon for your doll and have her visit for some hairstyles. Have her change her mind several times before finally settling on a style she loves.

steps.headline: Do fashion fun with your doll.
steps.description: Dress her up in different outfits. You could set up all sorts of fun reasons for constant clothing changes, such as modeling on the runway; visiting a friend and going swimming, then cycling, then walking, then having dinner, etc. ; a fashion shoot; a reality TV show; a concert; a parade or pageant; and so forth. Come up with awesome outfits that match her personality.

steps.headline: Play a board game with your American girl doll.
steps.description: Set the game up and have her choose her team, color or marker. Take it turns to play and move the pieces for her. See who wins!

steps.headline: Have a friend over with her American doll.
steps.description: The two dolls can get to know one another and perhaps even have a sleepover or party together. They could do chemistry experiments or chart the night sky together. Another alternative is to give your doll a friend from one of your other toys, such as a stuffed toy or another doll.

steps.headline: Make clothing for your doll, and/or accessories.
steps.description: You could even buy some things as well. Try out her new clothes and accessories when done.

steps.headline: Pretend that the doll is your sister or daughter.
steps.description: Go out shopping, visiting the zoo, solving math problems together or do some baking.

steps.headline: Come up with new names for your doll.
steps.description: Perhaps give her a makeover as well and turn her into a new personality. She could become a sporty girl, a scientist, a member of MENSA, etc.

steps.headline: Celebrate a special occasion together.
steps.description: Maybe it's her birthday or perhaps she just got her degree in astrophysics. Throw a party to celebrate. Other occasions could include holidays, seasons and the fabulous grades you've got for science and math.

steps.headline: Role play.
steps.description: There are lots of possibilities here, such as school, preschool, riding school, pet shop, American Idol, getting ready for a trip to the International Space Station, etc.

steps.headline: Watch videos with your doll.
steps.description: Choose ones suitable for her intellect and age. Make videos with your doll too. For example, make stop motions. Do the doll's hair, make clothes for her (sew the clothes or even make them out of a sock), then film some action sequences with her. If it's good enough, upload it to YouTube. If not, try harder next time.

steps.headline: Play doctors and nurses.
steps.description: Make a mini hospital from a box or closet. Find bandages, crutches, doctor's gear, etc. Have a notebook and stickers to take notes. Make a Get Well Soon sign.
